An accurate pass to the edge of the box is well taken by Daniel Sturridge (Liverpool), whose instinctive shot towards goal flashes inches wide of the left post.

Most of the fans probably aren't overly pleased with the development of the game. It hasn't been very exciting show so far. The first half was definitely edged by the visiting team. The home side is creating their opportunities using lightning fast counter attacks. The tactic of the away side is slow build up play.
